title: Sampler, 1814
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: double running, counted satin, hem, fishbone and cross stitches on plain weave
inscribed: Translation: Made by Estefana del Sol in the Royal Palace at Aranjuez. Long live Ferdinando VII King of Spain
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Viva F D O VII under a crown with medallion and flags.  Surrounded by detached motifs and five borders.  Inscription translation: Made by Estefana del Sol in the Royal Palace at Aranjuez. Long live Ferdinando VII King of Spain

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1814.
1814. Medium: silk embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: double running, counted satin, hem, fishbone and cross stitches on plain weave. Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe. 1941-69-233.
